name: VR Sky Fly
description:
*** Featured by Apple 620 times on Sports and Simulation Collection List type by different countries. ***

Do you want to fly? Here comes VR Sky Fly to let you fly virtually in the sky!

You are the player of paragliding. You have to land on the target square to complete the mission. No additional gamepad or equipment is needed. Just tilt your head to control the direction of movement. Simple and fun!

Features:
- Realistic terrain let you feel like flying in the real world. Do not hit a tree or any object!
- Just your iPhone and vr headset. No additional device is needed.
- Instant on screen display gives you information on landing target distance.
- Landing target can be found in the centre of the 3 orange smokes.
- The red reticle pointer helps you to find out your flying direction.
- First person view, which is more excited.
